Package index

Plotting and modeling functions

main functions for running models and plotting its output

ecodata: indicator data for reporting ecosystem health

A geom to fit a GLS model to a time series

geom_regime()
A geom to fit a regime shifts to a time series

Synthetic Indicators

Data files containing synthetic indicators used in the State of the Ecosystem Reports

ppr
Ecosystem Overfishing Indicators
wind_occupancy
Wind lease area and habitat occupancy model overlap
wind_port
Community Port Landings and Revenue from Wind Energy Areas (WEAs)

Human Dimension Indicators

Data files containing human-related indicators used in the State of the Ecosystem Reports

abc_acl
ABC or ACL for Managed Stocks
aquaculture
Oyster aquaculture
bennet
Bennet indicator
comdat
Aggregated commercial fisheries data
commercial_div
Commercial fisheries diversity
community_climate_vulnerability
Community climate vulnerability indicators
engagement
Commercial and recreational fishery social-economic indicators
hms_landings
Highly Migratory Species Landings and Revenue
hms_stock_status
Highly Migratory species stock status
recdat
Recreational fishing indicators
rec_hms
Recreational shark fishing landings
wea_landings_rev
Fisheries maximum and minimum landings and revenue from wind energy areas (WEAs).
wind_dev_speed
Wind energy development speed
wind_revenue
Fisheries revenue from wind lease areas

Megafauna Indicators

Data files containing megafauna indicators used in the State of the Ecosystem Reports

aggregate_biomass
NEFSC survey data broken into season and aggregate group biomass
benthos_index
Benthos Index
blue_runner
SAFMC managed Blue Runner presence on NES
condition
Fish Condition
energy_density
Forage fish energy density
exp_n
Expected Number of Species per 1000 Individuals
forage_index
Forage Index
grayseal
Gray Seal Bycatch
harborporpoise
Harbor porpoise bycatch
hms_category
Highly Migratory Species Category
hms_cpue
Highly Migratory Species Catch per Unit Effort
hp_density
hp_density
long_line_survey
longline survey
lps_sharks
lps_sharks ???
mab_inshore_survey
NEAMAP Mid-Atlantic inshore trawl survey
mass_inshore_survey
Massachusetts inshore bottom trawl survey
narw
North Atlantic right whale abundance
ne_inshore_survey
New England inshore state survey data
ne_inshore_survey_species
New England inshore state survey data species
observed_sharks
NE Observer program Shark data
productivity_anomaly
Small fish per large fish biomass anomaly
sandlance
Stellwagen Bank Sandlance
seabird_mab
Virginia waterbird productivity
seabird_ne
Common tern productivity and diet composition
seal_pups
Seal Pups counts in New England
species_dist
Species distribution on the NES.
species_groupings
Species groupings
stock_status
Managed species stock status
stom_fullness
Stomach fullness index calculated from NEFSC fall bottom trawl surveys
survey_shannon
Shannon Diversity of NEFSC Bottom Trawl Survey
zooplankton_index
Zooplankton Index

LTL/Hab/Env Indicators

Data files containing Low Trophic Level, Habitat and Environmental indicators used in the State of the Ecosystem Reports

bottom_temp_insitu
Bottom temperature
bottom_temp_model_anom
Bottom temperature - High Resolution
bottom_temp_model_gridded
Bottom temperature - Seasonal Gridded Product
bottom_temp_glorys
Bottom temperature - GLORYS
seasonal_bt_anomaly_gridded
Bottom temperature anomaly
calanus_stage
Calanus Stage
ches_bay_sst
Chesapeake Bay Gridded Sea Surface Temperature
ch_bay_sal
Chesapeake Bay salinity with historical trends for comparison
ch_bay_temp
Chesapeake Bay temperature with historical trends for comparison
ches_bay_wq
Chesapeake Bay Water Quality Attainment
chl_pp
Chlorophyll a and primary production and phytoplankton size class
cold_pool
Cold pool index
gsi
Gulf Stream Index
forage_anomaly
Forage Anomaly
habitat_diversity
Habitat Diversity
habitat_occupancy
Habitat Occupancy
habitat_vulnerability
Habitat Vulnerability
habs
Harmful Algal Blooms - Alexandrium and Paralitic Shellfish Poisoning
heatwave
Marine Heatwaves
heatwave_year
Marine heatwaves within most recent year
hudson_river_flow
Hudson River Flow
ichthyo_diversity
Ichthyoplankton diversity
long_term_sst
Long-term SST
SAV
Chesapeake Bay Submerged Aquatic Vegetation
seasonal_oisst_anom
Sea-surface temperature anomaly time serries
seasonal_oisst_anom_gridded
Sea-surface temperature anomaly
slopewater
Northeast Channel slopewater proportions
wcr
Warm core ring births
zoo_diversity
Zooplankton diversity
zoo_abundance_anom
Zooplankton abundance anomaly
zoo_regime
Zooplankton abundance anomaly used in regime shift analysis
zoo_strat_abun
Zooplankton stratified abundance for Euphausids and Cnidarians
